description: Provides a generic means to generate metrics via a command, or other scripting language

paramSchema.title: Poll Time (sec)
paramSchema.name: pollInterval
paramSchema.description: The Poll Interval to call the command. Defaults 5 seconds

paramSchema.title: Debug
paramSchema.name: debug
paramSchema.description: Turns on the debugging of the execution of the command

paramSchema.title: Command
paramSchema.name: command
paramSchema.description: Command or script to call to provide the metric
